prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with playful features and a bubbly personality.
Imagine a cute aquatic Pokemon that has a vibrant blue body with white accents.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a seal, known for its agility in the water.
Show me a Pokemon that is friendly and loves to dance in the waves.
Generate a water-type creature that is small and has a whimsical design.
Make a Pokemon with a rounded body and a cheerful expression, perfect for a starter.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that enjoys playing in the sea and has a captivating look.
